mapper.select: SELECT m_item.*, store_name FROM m_item LEFT JOIN m_store ON (m_item.store_id = m_store.id) WHERE item_name = #{item_name};
SELECT m_item.*, store_name FROM m_item LEFT JOIN m_store ON (m_item.store_id = m_store.id) LIMIT ${offset}, ${limit};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_item (item_name, store_id, price, item_img, inventory) VALUES (#{item_name}, #{store_id}, #{price}, #{item_img}, #{inventory});
mapper.update: UPDATE m_item SET item_name = #{item_name}, item_img = #{item_img}, price = #{price}, inventory = #{inventory}, store_id = #{store_id} WHERE id = #{id};
